title: London/Hammersmith and Fulham
name: Queens Club
directions: tube: Barons Court or West Kensington
content: hosts the traditional mens warm-up tennis competition, before the Wimbledon Chamipionship. This grand Victorian structure is home to other raquet sports such as badminton and squash. A new  '''National Tennis Centre''' has been built further west at Roehampton, to hopefully end the Wimbledon English-winner drought. | image=Queen's Club, Centre Court.jpg
